palette.title: gotta ♥ moon [ME]
palette.description: Here's what I love about myself, what makes me proud of saying "Yeah, that's me". working hard. Whatever I do, I always try to give my all. smile. Or rather, the ability to smile. For years, because of my royally messed up teeth, I've been thinking I would have never been able to smile without feeling ashamed. And guess what? I actually could - first form the insiede and then, with a little work on myself, from the outside. Now I don't have to worry about it any longer, but remembering those times make me enjoy smiling all the more. self confidence. When there's something I need to discuss with somebody, my first choice is myself, then my family and friends. I'm always there for Miriam and I don't have to beg for time or a kind word, or feel bad about causing trouble to others - after all, I'm the one I've got to stick until the very end with. irony. Among my family and peers the sharpness of my tongue is very well-known - but not feared, for I use it to make people laugh and not to make them feel miserable. curiosity. I'm a very curious girl. Mind me, not gossipy. I hate gossips. I just want to have a taste of whatever I manage to set my fretful green eyes upon.
